doctext: a powerful bomb hidden in a truck exploded outside the headquarters of colombia ' s secret police wednesday , causing severe damage , bogota mayor andres past ##rana said . early reports said several people were killed and injured . mr . past ##rana said the bomb exploded outside the building of the secret police , known from the spanish initials as das ( administrative department of security ) , in western bogota at 7 : 35 a . m . the nearby offices of the bogota transportation department were also damaged , he said .
